biography.content:
Dianne Heather Vincent completed her Animal Health Technologist Degree from the Northern Alberta Institute of Technology in 1981.  She worked 14 years alongside leading research physicians and scientists at the University of Alberta focusing on molecular mechanisms of renal disease.  A Nutritional Consultant Practioner and Professional Member of the International Organization of Nutrition Consultants (IONC) since 1996, she owns D&R Health and Business Investments Inc., focusing on improving people's health through nutrition. 

Since 2001, Dianne implemented the energy medicine modalities of GeoTran, Rife Frequencies, BodyTalk, EmotionCode, BodyCode, Qigong, Emotional Freedom Technique (EFT) and BioFeedback.  She became aware how energy medicine related to the human biofield and how higher consciousness influenced human potential and health.  In  2011 Dianne learned of Guruji Mahendra Trivedi and his unique ability to harness and transmit energy from the universe to living organisms and non-living materials anywhere in the world. Over 4000 documented studies showed this intelligent and beneficial energy initiates changes at the cellular, molecular and atomic level in agriculture, livestock, biotechnology, microbiology, genetics, human health, cancer and material science.   This unique phenomenon is known as the Trivedi Effect®.

Dianne joined the Trivedi Global Inc. Healing Masters program in 2011 and experienced a higher level of consciousness and spiritual awakening which lead to her ability to harness and transmit the intelligent universal energy of the Trivedi Effect®. Dianne is in a renowned group of 120 Trivedi Effect® Healing Masters whose Biofield Energy Treatments are scientifically validated and published in International, peer reviewed science journals.
